content: add some texture and spice to your kitchen with the cinnamon spice potholder this potholder is crocheted in the round in one piece which means that it is double thick and there is no sewing involved the cinnamon spice potholder uses the alpine stitch to create a beautiful texture that is double thick so you can use it safely in your kitchen > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** 1 and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the ** 2024 crochet along email list here 2 ** 2 > the free pattern for the cinnamon spice potholder can be found ** here 3 ** 3 > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** 4 > you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** 5 skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet front post double_crochet sizes this potholder includes two sizes 7 x 7 and 8 x 8 instructions are also provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 1 stitch marker or safety pin > yardage * size #1 165 yds / 151 m * size #2 205 yds / 188 m > yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/potholders-galore-crochet-along-2024 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/alpine-stitch-potholder/ 4 https //youtu be/c9r4bmydrl4 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
